item.title: Michael Urie on Making a Meal Out of a Monologue on ‘Shrinking’
item.description: Actors love to see a monologue coming. However, a monologue is rarely so nice that you get to do it twice, especially on TV. Leave it to Michael Urie and the AppleTV+ dramedy “Shrinking” team to craft

item.title: Harrison Ford Goes Deep on ‘Star Wars,’ His First Emmy Nomination for ‘Shrinking’ and the Future of America: ‘Rich Get Richer. Poor Get Poorer. That Ain’t Right’
item.description: “Is it just me or does he look like the president of the United States?” That’s what Jessica Williams whispered to the producers of “Shrinking” while she was watching from behind the camer
